text:
@seanhannity Hannity is pushing a drug that doesn't help but actually does more harm than good. 
Hannity & Trump have aggressively promoted to treat covid-19 had no benefit and was linked to higher rates of death for Veterans Affairs patients hospitalized with the novel coronavirus,
